Annotations.Annotation: Cube Schema for CCRS - SDGs, data, and partnerships

ExpressionView.SQL: select M.ID, COALESCE(PARTNER_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as PARTNER_ID, COALESCE(PARTNERSHIP_TYPE_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as PARTNERSHIP_TYPE_ID, COALESCE(AGREEMENT_TYPE_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as AGREEMENT_TYPE_ID, CASE WHEN M.MULTINATIONAL_BUSINESS_NAME IS NULL THEN '' ELSE MULTINATIONAL_BUSINESS_NAME END as MULTINATIONAL_BUSINESS_NAME, CP1.DESIGNATION, CP1.ENTITY_YEAR, COALESCE(COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, COALESCE(SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, COALESCE(cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY from CP14NONUNPARTNER_SPECIFIC_ACTIVITIES M JOIN CP14EMERGING_ISSUES cp14 ON M.PARENT_ID = cp14.ID JOIN CP1GENERAL_PROFILE CP1 ON cp14.DESIGNATION = cp1.DESIGNATION AND cp14.ENTITY_YEAR = cp1.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN BASE_COUNTRY bc ON CP1.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 JOIN v_cp_validated_designations v ON CP1.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = CP1.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN CATEGORY COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID on CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID=COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID on CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID=SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY PARTNER_ID ON M.PARTNER_ID=PARTNER_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY PARTNERSHIP_TYPE_ID ON M.PARTNERSHIP_TYPE_ID=PARTNERSHIP_TYPE_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY AGREEMENT_TYPE_ID ON M.AGREEMENT_TYPE_ID=AGREEMENT_TYPE_ID.ID WHERE CP1.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND CP1.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO'

select CASE WHEN cp14.DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_NATIONAL_STRATEGY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_NATIONAL_STRATEGY_COUNT, COALESCE(cp14.DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_NATIONAL_STRATEGY, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_NATIONAL_STRATEGY, CASE WHEN cp14.DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_FORMAL_MECHANISMS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_FORMAL_MECHANISMS_COUNT, COALESCE(cp14.DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_FORMAL_MECHANISMS, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_FORMAL_MECHANISMS, CASE WHEN cp14.DOESUNCTPARTICIPATE = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as DOESUNCTPARTICIPATE_COUNT, COALESCE(cp14.DOESUNCTPARTICIPATE, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS DOESUNCTPARTICIPATE, CASE WHEN cp14.INTERAGENCY_EFFORT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as INTERAGENCY_EFFORT_COUNT, COALESCE(cp14.INTERAGENCY_EFFORT, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS INTERAGENCY_EFFORT, CASE WHEN cp14.INTERAGENCY_GROUP = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as INTERAGENCY_GROUP_COUNT, COALESCE(cp14.INTERAGENCY_GROUP, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS INTERAGENCY_GROUP, CASE WHEN cp14.BUDGET_ACTIVITY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as BUDGET_ACTIVITY_COUNT, COALESCE(cp14.BUDGET_ACTIVITY, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS BUDGET_ACTIVITY, COALESCE(cp14.COMMON_INTERAGENCY_WORKPLAN, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS COMMON_INTERAGENCY_WORKPLAN, CASE WHEN cp14.COMMON_INTERAGENCY_WORKPLAN = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as COMMON_INTERAGENCY_WORKPLAN_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp14.USEIATISTANDARDS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as USEIATISTANDARDS_COUNT, COALESCE(cp14.USEIATISTANDARDS, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS USEIATISTANDARDS, cp14.ID, cp14.DESIGNATION, cp14.ENTITY_YEAR, COALESCE(COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, COALESCE(SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN cp14.JOINTUNCTEFFORT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as JOINTUNCTEFFORT_COUNT, COALESCE(cp14.JOINTUNCTEFFORT, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS JOINTUNCTEFFORT, CASE WHEN cp14.HAS_SUPPORT_TO_NATIONAL_STATS_CAPACITY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_SUPPORT_TO_NATIONAL_STATS_CAPACITY_COUNT, COALESCE(cp14.HAS_SUPPORT_TO_NATIONAL_STATS_CAPACITY, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_SUPPORT_TO_NATIONAL_STATS_CAPACITY, CASE WHEN cp14.HAS_INNOVATION_CITIZEN_ENGAGEMENT_CROWDSOURCING = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_INNOVATION_CITIZEN_ENGAGEMENT_CROWDSOURCING_COUNT, COALESCE(cp14.HAS_INNOVATION_CITIZEN_ENGAGEMENT_CROWDSOURCING, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_INNOVATION_CITIZEN_ENGAGEMENT_CROWDSOURCING, CASE WHEN cp14.HAS_NONUNPARTNERS_SPECIFIC_ACTIVITIES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_NONUNPARTNERS_SPECIFIC_ACTIVITIES_COUNT, COALESCE(cp14.HAS_NONUNPARTNERS_SPECIFIC_ACTIVITIES, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_NONUNPARTNERS_SPECIFIC_ACTIVITIES, CASE WHEN cp14.HAS_GOVERNMENT_REQUESTED_SUPPORT_ON_NATL_RESPONSESDG = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_GOVERNMENT_REQUESTED_SUPPORT_ON_NATL_RESPONSESDG_COUNT, COALESCE(cp14.HAS_GOVERNMENT_REQUESTED_SUPPORT_ON_NATL_RESPONSESDG, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_GOVERNMENT_REQUESTED_SUPPORT_ON_NATL_RESPONSESDG, CASE WHEN cp14.HAS_OPEN_DATA_TRANSPARENCY_POLICIES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_OPEN_DATA_TRANSPARENCY_POLICIES_COUNT, COALESCE(cp14.HAS_OPEN_DATA_TRANSPARENCY_POLICIES, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_OPEN_DATA_TRANSPARENCY_POLICIES, CASE WHEN cp14.JOINTUNINITIATIVE_ON_DATA_OR_STATISTICS_PRESENT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as JOINTUNINITIATIVE_ON_DATA_OR_STATISTICS_PRESENT_COUNT, COALESCE(cp14.JOINTUNINITIATIVE_ON_DATA_OR_STATISTICS_PRESENT, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS JOINTUNINITIATIVE_ON_DATA_OR_STATISTICS_PRESENT, CASE WHEN cp14.GOVERNMENTSDGREPORT_PUBLISHED = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as GOVERNMENTSDGREPORT_PUBLISHED_COUNT, COALESCE(cp14.GOVERNMENTSDGREPORT_PUBLISHED, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS GOVERNMENTSDGREPORT_PUBLISHED, CASE WHEN c.DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_PRIVATE_SECTOR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_PRIVATE_SECTOR_COUNT, COALESCE(c.DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_PRIVATE_SECTOR, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_PRIVATE_SECTOR, CASE WHEN c.DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_CIVIL_SOCIETY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_CIVIL_SOCIETY_COUNT, COALESCE(c.DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_CIVIL_SOCIETY, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_CIVIL_SOCIETY, CASE WHEN s.MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING_COUNT, COALESCE(s.MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING, CASE WHEN s.UN_PROVIDED_MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as UN_PROVIDED_MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING_COUNT, COALESCE(s.UN_PROVIDED_MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS UN_PROVIDED_MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING, CASE WHEN s.MAINSTREAMING = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as MAINSTREAMING_COUNT, COALESCE(s.MAINSTREAMING, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS MAINSTREAMING, CASE WHEN s.UN_PROVIDED_MAINSTREAMING = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as UN_PROVIDED_MAINSTREAMING_COUNT, COALESCE(s.UN_PROVIDED_MAINSTREAMING, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS UN_PROVIDED_MAINSTREAMING, CASE WHEN s.GENERAL_ORIENTATION = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as GENERAL_ORIENTATION_COUNT, COALESCE(s.GENERAL_ORIENTATION, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS GENERAL_ORIENTATION, CASE WHEN s.UN_PROVIDED_GENERAL_ORIENTATION = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as UN_PROVIDED_GENERAL_ORIENTATION_COUNT, COALESCE(s.UN_PROVIDED_GENERAL_ORIENTATION, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS UN_PROVIDED_GENERAL_ORIENTATION, CASE WHEN s.REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS_COUNT, COALESCE(s.REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS, CASE WHEN s.UN_PROVIDED_REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as UN_PROVIDED_REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS_COUNT, COALESCE(s.UN_PROVIDED_REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS UN_PROVIDED_REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS, CASE WHEN r.HASUNSUPPORT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNSUPPORT_COUNT, COALESCE(r.HASUNSUPPORT, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNSUPPORT, CASE WHEN r.INTERAGENCY_EFFORT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as REPORT_INTERAGENCY_EFFORT_COUNT, COALESCE(r.INTERAGENCY_EFFORT, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS REPORT_INTERAGENCY_EFFORT, COALESCE(USED_FOR_VOLUNTARY_NATIONAL_REVIEW_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as USED_FOR_VOLUNTARY_NATIONAL_REVIEW_ID, COALESCE(cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY, CASE WHEN cp14.has_disaggregated_data = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as has_disaggregated_data_count, COALESCE(cp14.has_disaggregated_data, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS has_disaggregated_data_dim FROM CP14EMERGING_ISSUES cp14 JOIN CP14COMMONUNDATA_STRATEGY c ON cp14.ID = c.PARENT_ID JOIN CP14SDGSUPPORT s ON cp14.ID = s.PARENT_ID JOIN CP14GOVERNMENTSDGREPORT r ON cp14.ID = r.PARENT_ID JOIN CP1GENERAL_PROFILE cp1 ON cp14.DESIGNATION = cp1.DESIGNATION AND cp14.ENTITY_YEAR = cp1.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN BASE_COUNTRY bc ON cp14.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 JOIN v_cp_validated_designations v ON cp14.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = cp14.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN CATEGORY COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID on CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID=COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID on CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID=SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USED_FOR_VOLUNTARY_NATIONAL_REVIEW_ID ON r.USED_FOR_VOLUNTARY_NATIONAL_REVIEW_ID=USED_FOR_VOLUNTARY_NATIONAL_REVIEW_ID.ID WHERE cp14.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND cp14.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO'

Dimension.name: OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY
Dimension.caption: Delivering as One

Dimension.name: Year
Dimension.caption: Year

Dimension.name: COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID
Dimension.caption: Country Income Status

Dimension.name: SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID
Dimension.caption: Secondary Country Income Status

Dimension.name: PARTNER_ID
Dimension.caption: Partner

Dimension.name: Multinational business name
Dimension.caption: Name of the Multinational business

Dimension.name: PARTNERSHIP_TYPE_ID
Dimension.caption: Partnership Type

Dimension.name: AGREEMENT_TYPE_ID
Dimension.caption: Agreement Type

Measure.name: Count
Measure.caption: Number of UNCT Partners

Dimension.name: OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY
Dimension.caption: Delivering as One

Dimension.name: Year
Dimension.caption: Year

Dimension.name: COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID
Dimension.caption: Country Income Status

Dimension.name: SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID
Dimension.caption: Secondary Country Income Status

Dimension.name: DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_NATIONAL_STRATEGY
Dimension.caption: Does the government have an updated and operational National Strategy for the Development of Statistics?

Dimension.name: DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_FORMAL_MECHANISMS
Dimension.caption: Does the government have formal mechanisms to coordinate statistical development efforts with development partners, including the United Nations?

Dimension.name: DOESUNCTPARTICIPATE
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT participate in this mechanism?

Dimension.name: HAS_SUPPORT_TO_NATIONAL_STATS_CAPACITY
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT provide support to national statistical capacity?

Dimension.name: INTERAGENCY_EFFORT
Dimension.caption: Is this an interagency effort?

Dimension.name: INTERAGENCY_GROUP
Dimension.caption: Is there an interagency group on data and statistics?

Dimension.name: BUDGET_ACTIVITY
Dimension.caption: Is there a budget for this activity?

Dimension.name: COMMON_INTERAGENCY_WORKPLAN
Dimension.caption: Is there a common interagency workplan for this activity?

Dimension.name: HAS_INNOVATION_CITIZEN_ENGAGEMENT_CROWDSOURCING
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT apply innovation during UN country programming?

Dimension.name: JOINTUNCTEFFORT
Dimension.caption: Is it a joint UNCT effort? (applying innovation)

Dimension.name: HAS_NONUNPARTNERS_SPECIFIC_ACTIVITIES
Dimension.caption: Does your UNCT convene partners beyond the UN for specific policy activities?

Dimension.name: HAS_GOVERNMENT_REQUESTED_SUPPORT_ON_NATL_RESPONSESDG
Dimension.caption: Has your government requested support on their national response to Sustainable Development Goals?

Dimension.name: HAS_OPEN_DATA_TRANSPARENCY_POLICIES
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT have open data/transparency portals?

Dimension.name: USEIATISTANDARDS
Dimension.caption: Do you use IATI standards in the portal?

Dimension.name: JOINTUNINITIATIVE_ON_DATA_OR_STATISTICS_PRESENT
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT have a joint UN initiative on data or statistics?

Dimension.name: DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_PRIVATE_SECTOR
Dimension.caption: Does this include data activity with private sector?

Dimension.name: DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_CIVIL_SOCIETY
Dimension.caption: Does this include data activity with civil society?

Dimension.name: MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING
Dimension.caption: Did the government request support for SDG Measurement and Reporting?

Dimension.name: UN_PROVIDED_MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING
Dimension.caption: Did the UN provide support for SDG Measurement and Reporting?

Dimension.name: MAINSTREAMING
Dimension.caption: Did the government request support for Mainstreaming SDG in National Development Plans?

Dimension.name: UN_PROVIDED_MAINSTREAMING
Dimension.caption: Did the UN provide support for Mainstreaming SDG in National Development Plans?

Dimension.name: GENERAL_ORIENTATION
Dimension.caption: Did the government request support for General Orientation on SDGs?

Dimension.name: UN_PROVIDED_GENERAL_ORIENTATION
Dimension.caption: Did the UN provide support for General Orientation on SDGs?

Dimension.name: REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS
Dimension.caption: Did the government request support on specific SDGs?

Dimension.name: UN_PROVIDED_REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS
Dimension.caption: Did the UN provide support on specific SDGs?

Dimension.name: GOVERNMENTSDGREPORT_PUBLISHED
Dimension.caption: Has your partner government published a Country-led SDG Report this year?

Dimension.name: HASUNSUPPORT
Dimension.caption: Has the UN supported the Government in producing the report?

Dimension.name: REPORT_INTERAGENCY_EFFORT
Dimension.caption: Was the support provided as an interagency effort?

Dimension.name: USED_FOR_VOLUNTARY_NATIONAL_REVIEW_ID
Dimension.caption: Was the report used for a Voluntary National Review presentation at the High-level Political Forum in New York?

Dimension.name: has_disaggregated_data_dim
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT have access to official government data?

Measure.name: Count
Measure.caption: Number of Country Records Submitted

Measure.name: DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_NATIONAL_STRATEGY
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the government have an updated and operational National Strategy for the Development of Statistics?'

Measure.name: DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_FORMAL_MECHANISMS
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the government have formal mechanisms to coordinate statistical development efforts with development partners, including the United Nations?'

Measure.name: DOESUNCTPARTICIPATE
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the UNCT participate in this mechanism?'

Measure.name: SupportNationalstatisticalcapacity
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT provide support to national statistical capacity

Measure.name: INTERAGENCY_EFFORT
Measure.caption: Count of 'Is this an interagency effort?'

Measure.name: INTERAGENCY_GROUP
Measure.caption: Count of 'Is there an interagency group on data and statistics?'

Measure.name: BUDGET_ACTIVITY
Measure.caption: Count of 'Is there a budget for this activity?'

Measure.name: COMMON_INTERAGENCY_WORKPLAN
Measure.caption: Count of 'Is there a common interagency workplan for this activity?'

Measure.name: CitizenEngagementCrowdSourcing
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the UNCT apply innovation during UN country programming?'

Measure.name: JOINTUNCTEFFORT
Measure.caption: Count of 'Is it a joint UNCT effort?' (applying innovation)

Measure.name: UNCTConvenePartnersBeyondUN
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT convene partners beyond the UN for specific policy activities

Measure.name: SustainableDevelopmentGoals
Measure.caption: Count of government requested support on their national response to Sustainable Development Goals

Measure.name: DataRransparencyPoliciesPortals
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the UNCT have open data/transparency portals?'

Measure.name: USEIATISTANDARDS
Measure.caption: Count of 'Do you use IATI standards in the portal?'

Measure.name: JOINTUNINITIATIVE_ON_DATA_OR_STATISTICS_PRESENT
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT that have a joint UN initiative on data or statistics

Measure.name: DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_PRIVATE_SECTOR
Measure.caption: Count of data activity with private sector

Measure.name: DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_CIVIL_SOCIETY
Measure.caption: Count of data activity with civil society

Measure.name: MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING
Measure.caption: Count of government requests to support for SDG Measurement and Reporting

Measure.name: UN_PROVIDED_MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING
Measure.caption: Count of UN provided support for SDG Measurement and Reporting

Measure.name: MAINSTREAMING
Measure.caption: Count of government requests to support for Mainstreaming SDG in National Development Plans

Measure.name: UN_PROVIDED_MAINSTREAMING
Measure.caption: Count of UN provided support for Mainstreaming SDG in National Development Plans

Measure.name: GENERAL_ORIENTATION
Measure.caption: Count of government requests to support for General Orientation on SDGs

Measure.name: UN_PROVIDED_GENERAL_ORIENTATION
Measure.caption: Count of UN provided support for General Orientation on SDGs

Measure.name: REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS
Measure.caption: Count of government requests to support on specific SDGs

Measure.name: UN_PROVIDED_REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS
Measure.caption: Count of UN provided support on specific SDGs

Measure.name: GOVERNMENTSDGREPORT_PUBLISHED
Measure.caption: Count of partner governments that published a Country-led SDG Report this year

Measure.name: HASUNSUPPORT
Measure.caption: Count of UN supported the Government in producing the report

Measure.name: REPORT_INTERAGENCY_EFFORT
Measure.caption: Count of UN supported the Government in producing the report as an interagency effort

Measure.name: hasDisaggregatedData
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the UNCT have access to official government data?'
